name: Google BigQuery Tool
natural_language_description: 这是 Google BigQuery Tool 节点。主要用于: Consume Google BigQuery API

descriptionType.name: descriptionType
descriptionType.natural_language_description: 参数名: Tool Description | 默认值: auto
available_options: Set Automatically (值: auto) - Automatically set based on resource and operation
Set Manually (值: manual) - Manually set the description

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.natural_language_description: 参数名: Description | 作用: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often | 默认值: Consume Google BigQuery API | (必填项)

authentication.name: authentication
authentication.natural_language_description: 参数名: Authentication | 默认值: oAuth2

resource.name: resource
resource.natural_language_description: 参数名: Resource | 默认值: database

operation.name: operation
operation.natural_language_description: 参数名: Operation | 默认值: executeQuery
available_options: Execute Query (值: executeQuery) - Execute a SQL query
Insert (值: insert) - Insert rows in a table

projectId.name: projectId
projectId.description: Projects to which you have been granted any project role
projectId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Project | 作用: Projects to which you have been granted any project role | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

datasetId.name: datasetId
datasetId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Dataset | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

tableId.name: tableId
tableId.natural_language_description: 参数名: Table | 默认值: {'mode': 'list', 'value': ''} | (必填项)

sqlQuery.name: sqlQuery
sqlQuery.description: SQL query to execute, you can find more information about Legacy SQL syntax here
sqlQuery.natural_language_description: 参数名: SQL Query | 作用: SQL query to execute, you can find more information about Legacy SQL syntax here | 提示: Legacy SQL syntax

options.name: options
options.natural_language_description: 参数名: Options | 默认值: {}
available_options: ignoreUnknownValues (值: None) - Whether to gnore row values that do not match the schema
skipInvalidRows (值: None) - Whether to skip rows with values that do not match the schema
templateSuffix (值: None) - Create a new table based on the destination table and insert rows into the new table. The new table will be named `{destinationTable}{templateSuffix}`
traceId (值: None) - Unique ID for the request, for debugging only. It is case-sensitive, limited to up to 36 ASCII characters. A UUID is recommended.

dataMode.name: dataMode
dataMode.description: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row
dataMode.natural_language_description: 参数名: Data Mode | 作用: Whether to insert the input data this node receives in the new row | 默认值: autoMap
available_options: Auto-Map Input Data (值: autoMap) - Use when node input properties match destination field names
Map Each Field Below (值: define) - Set the value for each destination field

info.displayName: In this mode, make sure the incoming data fields are named the same as the columns in BigQuery. (Use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change them if required.)
info.name: info
info.natural_language_description: 参数名: In this mode, make sure the incoming data fields are named the same as the columns in BigQuery. (Use an 'Edit Fields' node before this node to change them if required.)

fieldsUi.name: fieldsUi
fieldsUi.natural_language_description: 参数名: Fields to Send | 默认值: {}
